name: Matcha Premium
description: Organic ceremonial grade matcha, harvested in Uji, for a pure and refined experience.

name: Collagen Matcha
description: Revitalizing blend of matcha, collagen, hyaluronic acid, and magnesium.

name: Vanilla Matcha
description: Organic matcha with a gentle touch of vanilla - perfect for lattes.

name: Chocolate Matcha
description: Matcha blended with cocoa for a tasty and energizing break.

name: Golden Milk Matcha
description: Golden blend of matcha, turmeric, and warm spices for a comforting latte.

name: Matcha Latte
description: Ideal pack for beginners: mild matcha + instructions + measuring spoon.

name: Matcha Rooibos
description: Light evening formula with pure matcha and detoxifying plants.

name: Matcha Original
description: Classic blend of matcha with ginger, lemongrass, and mint for a refreshing start to the day.

name: Spicy Chai
description: Essential kit with matcha and spices to prepare delicious chai lattes.

name: Expert Matcha Kit
description: Expert kit with several varieties of matcha for advanced enthusiasts.

name: Ceremonial Uji Matcha
description: Ceremonial grade matcha from Uji, Japan.

description: Zen ritual kit with matcha and accessories for a calming tea experience.

name: Chai Chocolate
description: Blend of chai spices, and chocolate for a unique flavor.

name: Culinary Matcha
description: High-quality matcha for cooking and baking.

name: Strawberry Matcha
